title: Scan Product
subtitle: Use your camera or enter barcode manually
infoTip: Camera access requires HTTPS on mobile devices. If camera doesn't work, you can always use manual barcode entry below - it works just as well!

cameraError.notSupported: Camera API not supported on this device. Please use manual entry below.
cameraError.httpsRequired: Camera requires secure connection (HTTPS). Please use manual barcode entry below, or access via HTTPS.
cameraError.permissionDenied: Camera access denied. Please allow camera permissions in your browser settings and try again.
cameraError.noCamera: No camera found on this device. Please use manual barcode entry below.
cameraError.inUse: Camera is already in use by another app. Please close other apps and try again.
cameraError.constraintsFailed: Camera constraints not supported. Trying again with default settings...
cameraError.securityError: Camera access blocked by security settings. Try accessing via HTTPS or use manual entry.
cameraError.unknown: Unable to access camera. Please use manual barcode entry below.
cameraError.whyHttps: Why? Mobile browsers require a secure connection (HTTPS) for camera access. You can still use manual barcode entry below, or ask your administrator to enable HTTPS.
cameraError.howToFix: How to fix: Go to your browser settings → Site permissions → Camera → Allow access for this site, then refresh and try again.

results.productNotFound: Product not found. Try another barcode.
